description:
Testing Python-Novaclient version 2012.2 with an HPCS account generates the following error. nova volume-list Could not find any suitable endpoint. Correct region? ERROR:       The previous version Nova, 2012.1 is working fine.   
Credentials tested with
export OS_USERNAME=EMAIL
export OS_PASSWORD=PASSWORD
export OS_TENANT_NAME=TENANT NAME
export OS_AUTH_URL=https://region-a.geo-1.identity.hpcloudsvc.com:35357/v2.0/
export OS_COMPUTE_API_VERSION=1.1
export OS_REGION_NAME=az-1.region-a.geo-1
title: Python-Novaclient version 2012.2 generates Could not find any suitable endpoint. Correct region? ERROR: when used with an HPCS account.

comments.content:

comments.content: Is there an update on this?
